video.title: The Yahoo! - Microsoft Merger: How Private is Your Privacy Online?
video.description:
Why is privacy relevant to Internet company mergers? And what kinds of privacy solutions should merging companies consider? Center for American Progress Senior Fellow Peter Swire explains that Microsoft's bid for Yahoo! deserves some strong scrutiny from Federal regulators, to ensure that the companies don't overstep their bounds with consumers.

www.AMERICANPROGRESS.org
